name: NEBUXEL - UNIT
description:
Unit is the fifth protagonist of the Nebuxel series.

“Unit” , the subject, represents the essence that will populate the Metaverse: our projection in units, a sort of run towards singularity, uniqueness, the precise moment in which anything organic is removed from the human equation. How will humanity evolve? And does human evolution necessarily have to be tied to the physical world?

This work particularly takes us back to the underlying theme of the entire Nebuxel series: humanity intertwined with technology. To focus not so much on a perspective of the two subjects viewed as parallel in the evolution of mankind, but as an unicum, a continuous flow destined to fulfill our collective potential within the Metaverse. 

Here, thinking and existing become one.
